Posts.Content: Ila wrote: Hi everybody. I had a lumpectomy October 2006. My radiation therapy was completed in March 07 . In OctoberÂ  07 I had my first followup mamogram scan and ultrasound to check on a lump. The thing is that I didnt notice much in the way of after affects of the radiation untill after the mamogram. The breast und underarm area has become more tender verging on soreness since then. I am due for another followup mamogram in two weeks , and I am concerned about the outcome re increased pain or tissue damage . I can deal with the discomfort if I know it is normal and is not caused by further damage. Has anyone else experienced increased pain following radiation then mamogram? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: soreness after radiation and mamogram Ila NONE

Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2008 03:39AM Ila wrote: Thanks Jennine for responding , it helps just talking about it. I will see my surgeon tomorrow and ask what he thinks. Thanks again Jennine. Will let you know what he says. Ila
